hero.title: You can always count on us
hero.sub-title: We are fully prepared and highly capable to provide business advisory and logistical services for importing all goods from China

About.sub-header: Learn about our company, what we do, and become one of our clients

why-us.title: We provide full range global logistics solution
why-us.sub-title: It was launched within Chinese ports with a specialized, experienced and efficient team, until we were able to build a good reputation in record time. We specialize in importing from China for government and private sectors and individuals, and thanks to our highly experienced cadres who seek to provide first-class services in terms of quality, cost and solutions, We are fully prepared and highly capable to provide commercial, advisory and logistical services for importing all goods from China.

our-services.title: Discover Our Services and Request Yours Now
our-services.sub-title: We provide all the commercial and logistical services needed by companies, institutions, government entities, and individuals.
our-services.service-1: Finding the best quality and price factories
our-services.service-3: Drafting commercial contracts between the merchant and the factory
our-services.service-5: Shipping goods to all countries worldwide

GetOrder.sub-header: Everything you need to know from placing an order to receiving it
GetOrder.title: Import in safe and easy steps
GetOrder.sub-title: These are all the steps in detail to order a product from China in a series of easy and safe steps

stage-1.title: Receiving Customer's Order
stage-1.step-1: We receive the initial order from the customer via email
stage-1.step-2: An initial file is opened for the customer containing all their data
stage-1.step-3: We review the order and determine the deposit amount
stage-1.step-4: We request the customer to transfer the deposit amount
stage-1.step-5: We review the order and prepare the data in the approved form

stage-2.title: Sending the Order to China
stage-2.step-1: We send the order to the China team via email
stage-2.step-2: The China team searches for the best quality with the best price
stage-2.step-3: The duration of searching and shortlisting for quotation is a week from the email sending date

stage-3.title: Receiving Quotation from China
stage-3.step-1: We receive the quotation from China via email
stage-3.step-2: We add the company's approved margin to the quotation
stage-3.step-3: We review the order with the top management
stage-3.step-4: We approve the final price quotation

stage-4.title: Sending Quotation to Customer
stage-4.img-alt: A calculator on top of a financial account sheet
stage-4.step-1: We send the quotation to the customer via email
stage-4.step-2: Customer responds within the validity period of the quotation
stage-4.step-3: Customer approves the quotation definitively via email

stage-5.title: Contract Signing
stage-5.step-1: Preparing, drafting, and reviewing the contract based on the approved quotation
stage-5.step-2: Communicating with the customer to set the contract signing time at the company's premises
stage-5.step-3: Signing, stamping, and archiving the contract in the customer's file
stage-5.step-4: Receiving the initial payment as per the contract agreement

stage-6.title: Order Confirmation
stage-6.step-1: Sending the final order to the China team via email based on the agreed contract terms
stage-6.step-2: The China team communicates with the factory and reaches an agreement with them
stage-6.step-3: Transferring the advance payment to the China team

stage-7.title: Working on the Order
stage-7.img-alt: A man wraps goods in a warehouse
stage-7.step-1: The China team agrees with the approved factory
stage-7.step-2: Manufacturing of the required product begins with the contracted specifications
stage-7.step-3: Mutual coordination to know the shipping date
stage-7.step-4: Receiving the second installment of the contract
stage-7.step-6: Confirming with the customer about preparing the final payment

stage-8.title: Product Arrival
stage-8.step-1: Preparing the required documents for the entry of goods through government websites
stage-8.step-2: Informing the customer of the arrival date of the goods and preparing the warehouse
stage-8.step-3: Receiving the goods from customs and clearing customs
stage-8.step-4: Receiving the final installment from the customer
stage-8.step-5: Delivering the goods to the customer
stage-8.step-6: Settling accounts with finance and closing the order file

FAQ.sub-header: Everything You Need To Know About Us
FAQ.title: Need help with something? Here are our most frequently asked questions
FAQ.qus-1: What distinguishes you as an import company from China?
FAQ.ans-1: Experience is the most important element in the field of import and export
FAQ.qus-2: How is your work going? What methods do you follow?
FAQ.ans-2:
Specify the products you wish to import, in addition to their quantities and types.
Collect everything related to the standards and specifications of the goods and send them to the factories
Verifying goods certificates
Monitoring the quality of goods and their conformity according to the required specifications
Final inspection of the goods and then packaging
Shipping and customs clearance
FAQ.qus-3: Is it possible to ship an order within China?
FAQ.ans-3: We provide shipping of your orders between cities in China, in addition to storing the goods.
FAQ.qus-4: Is it possible to ship to Gulf countries and other countries?
FAQ.ans-4: We ship to all countries of the world
FAQ.qus-5: How long does it usually take to purchase and send an order?
FAQ.ans-5:
If the product is ready, the shipping period only takes (the average shipping period is 25 days)
Products that need to be manufactured (the manufacturing period ranges from 7 days to a month) have a shipping period added.
